headline: What Makes EMCOR Group (EME) a Good Investment?
summary: TimesSquare Capital Management, an equity investment management company, released its “U.S. Focus Growth Strategy” first quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The broad-based downturn in US equities underperformed overseas markets in the first quarter. In this negative environment, the strategy outperformed the index in the first quarter. The […]
